categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Echo Three" was a male pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. After the destruction of Alderaan, he served under the callsign Echo Three for Echo Squadron and participated in a battle at Fostar Haven, flying an X-wing, where he assisted in the rescue of  a stranded Alderaanian refugee convoy under attack from the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Vigilance.
"Echo Three" was a Rebel non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
